section.p: You are passing through a wooded glade when you here a horrendous trumpeting noise. Suddenly, a massive bear-like form about the size of a large bull appears in front of you. It looks rather like a huge hairy toad, with a gaping, toothy mouth.
The creature breathes a billowing cloud of noxious, sulphurous gas at you. You feel your head swim as you start to fall asleep.

Roll one die, and subtract one from the total.
